about_the_game:
The Starsand digital supporter pack grants access to various digital goodies and expands your desert adventure with exclusive content such as artbook, wallpaper or the original soundtrack.

Original Starsand Soundtrack
Mystical, exciting or just to enjoy. The soundtrack created especially for Starsand embodies the special features of the game in different music tracks and lets you immerse yourself in foreign worlds.

4K Wallpapers
Exclusive backgrounds conjure up the desert with all its beauty on your PC. Whether on Earth or far away on an alien planet, high quality images will beautify your screen and let you dream.

Digital Artbook
From a simple scribble to the final graphic - the developers present their artistic work in an extensive artbook.

Video Guides
The exclusive video guides take you by the hand and guide you through the special features of Starsand. Various tips and explanations will help you to get started with the game and to solve some difficult tasks.

Comic
This 12 page comic provides some additional background bits on Starsand's storyline.

Access to the digital goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the Steam installation directory of the game in the folder "Digital Supporter Pack Content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Starsand) after the download of the "Digital Supporter Pack" DLC package is completed.

name: Starsand - Digital Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 (4th Generation) or equivalent AMD, min. 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th Generation) or equivalent AMD, min. 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Starsand digital supporter pack grants access to various digital goodies and expands your desert adventure with exclusive content such as artbook, wallpaper or the original soundtrack.
